programme.title: M.O.D.O.K
programme.desc: Hooaja lõpuosas saab perekond taas uhiselt kokku Lou bar mitzvah pidustustel, kuid uhe kurikaela ullatuslik naasmine ahvardab M.O.D.O.K.-i minevikku, olevikku ja tulevikku.

programme.title: Elavad surnud
programme.desc: Ruhm otsustab varuplaani kasuks, kuigi Hershel on sellele otsustavalt vastu. Ta utleb ruhmale, et nad ei saa igaveseks sinna jaada.

programme.title: Vanadus on hullus
programme.desc: Parast vanaaegse kabrioletiga võidusõitu Palm Springsi umbruses kaotas pensionil olev NASA katsepiloot juhiload. Olles sunnitud kasutama uhistransporti, kohtub ta Carolineiga ning õpib nii mõndagi uut armastuse ja elu kohta.

programme.title: Snaiper
programme.desc: Ukraina 2022 sõjafilm Lavastaja:Marian Bushan Osades:Pavlo Aldošõn, Marina Koškina, Andrei Mostrenko, Oleg Šulga Ukraina. 2014.Matemaatikaõpetaja Mõkola (Pavlo Aldošõn) on ekstsentriline patsifist, keda tõmbab tagasi looduse ruppe ja kes soovib ule kõige olla inimkonnale kasulik. Oma lapseootel abikaasa Nastjaga (Marina Koškina) elavad nad Donetski regioonis oma maalapile ehitatud onnis ning ei saaks olla õnnelikumad.Siis uhel paeval algab Donbassis sõda. Mõkola naiivsevõitu maailm variseb kokku, kui agressorid tapavad ta elu armastuse ning põletavad ta kodu maani maha. Mees ei suuda leida seletust ega õigustust taolisele julmusele ning teeb oma elus kannapoorde - kunagine veendunud patsifist asub õppima snaipriks, kus tema matemaatikaalased teadmised suureks eeliseks osutuvad. Samas ei tohi unustada, et kattemaksuiha viib sind uksnes teatud piirini, sealt edasi viivad sind juba omandatud oskused, kaine mõistus ja tahe võidelda kodumaa vabaduse eest. Ka siis, kui seda tehes tuleks ohverdada oma elu.

programme.title: Lõpmatu
programme.desc: Mees avastab, et tema hallutsinatsioonid on tegelikult nagemused eelmistest eludest.

programme.title: Kurepoeg Rihhard 2
programme.desc: Varblane Rihhard on lõplikult valmis, saamaks teejuhiks! Ta teab tapselt, kuidas talvitunud kureparvele ule Aafrika liivakõrbe, tohutute ookeanide ja ohtlike vainade koduteed naidata. Jaab ule vaid eksam sooritada – praktikandi test, et saada kureparve juhiks. See ei tohiks olla keeruline, sest Rihhard on eriline varblane, kes kasvas ules kurgedega ja on juba ammu omandanud kõik lendamise peensused. Sellest pole midagi, et ta on vaike – ta on hingelt tõeline kurg!

programme.title: Kuidas taltsutada lohet
programme.sub-title: Kuidas taltsutada lohet: oise vimma kingitus
programme.desc: Berki viikingid valmistuvad kõigi ullatuseks koos lohedega aasta kõige olulisemat pidupaeva tahistama, kuid puhadevaimsust varjutab lemmikute salaparane kadumine. Parast otsinguid ja seikluseid selgub aga, et kadumine oli õilsal eesmargil ning lohed saabuvad tagasi rõõmusõnumiga ning oodatust suurema seltskonnaga.

programme.title: Tagasi tulevikku
programme.desc: USA 1985 ulme/seikluskomoodia Lavastaja:Robert Zemeckis Osades: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson Dr. Emmett Brown leiutab autost ajamasina, millega ta saaks reisida tulevikku, kuid ool, mil ta seda imeparast leiutist katsetab lastakse Dr. Brown maha, temaga kaasas olnud 17-aastane Marty McFly põgeneb ajamasinaga Emmetti tapjate eest ja satub aastasse 1955, kus ta segab vahele oma vanemate kokkusaamisele ja Marty ema armub temasse.Nuud on ajalugu sassi loodud ning tal tuleb abistada George McFlyd, et ta saaks kokku Lorraine Bainesiga, sest muidu ei sunni Martyt.Muidugi pole lihtne tagasi 80-ndatesse tagasi poorduda, sest ajamasina tooks on vaja vaga võimast jõudu ja Marty peab abipalvega poorduma noore Dr. Emmett Browni poole. Marty ulesanded pole kerged, sest kaalul on tema enda elu.

programme.title: Tagasi tulevikku 2
programme.desc: USA 1989 ulme/seikluskomoodia Lavastaja:Robert Zemeckis Osades: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson Ülipopulaarse seiklustriloogia teine osa, kus Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) ja tema sõber Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd) uhke sportautoga ajas randavad. Sedapuhku satub Marty eksikombel aastasse 2015. Asjad võtavad aga ohtliku poorde, kui Marty ja teiste McFlyde vihavaenlane Biff Tannen varastab ajamasina, sõidab 1950ndatesse aastatesse ja annab iseendale teatmiku, kus kirjas kõik tulevaste aastate spordivõistluste tulemused. Seelabi saab tulevik sootuks teise nao - Biff on kõikvõimas miljonar, abielus Marty emaga ja tema idulliline kodukant on muutunud maapealseks põrguks. Õiglus ja kord tuleb taas jalule seada...

programme.title: Tagasi tulevikku III
programme.desc: USA 1990 ulme/seikluskomoodia Lavastaja:Robert Zemeckis Osades: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen Kuulsa triloogia viimane peatukk viib meie erinevates ajaperioodides randava sõbra Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) Metsikusse Laande, kus elatakse aastas 1885 ja kus on end mugavasti sisse seadnud ka Marty sõber Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd). Sinna jõudes peab ta paastma Doci viimase peale vihavaenu pidava Tanneni klanni kaest ja samal ajal muretsema, kuidas paaseda tagasi olevikku, sest tema ajamasinast sportauto on selle rannaku kaigus tõsiseid vigastusi saanud.

programme.title: Maadeavastaja Tad ja kuningas Midase saladus
programme.desc: Eesti keeles. Tad Jones, kõige kohmetum maadeuurija, peab paastma oma armastatud Sara miljonari kaest, kes otsib King Midase kaelakeedi.

programme.title: Valge lind
programme.desc: Bestselleri "Ime" autori uuel inspireerival raamatul "Valge lind: lugu imest" põhinev samanimeline film raagib jargmise peatukina loo Julianist (Bryce Gheisar), kellel on raskusi kohanemisega parast seda, kui ta koolist Auggie Pullmani kohtlemise tõttu valja visati.

programme.title: Kutsuge Jane
programme.desc: Abielus naine, kes on soovimatult rasedaks jaanud, elab Ameerikas ajal, mil ei saanud legaalset aborti teha. Naine teeb abi leidmiseks koostood aarelinna naistega.

programme.title: Kasilased
programme.desc: USA / Jaapan / Prantsusmaa 2015 animakomoodia EESTI KEELES! Lavastaja: Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin Osades(haaled):Priit Võigemast Scarleti abikaasana, Tiina Tauraite kuningannana, Mart Avandi Walter Nelsonina, Haide Mannamae Madge Nelsonina, Maiken Schmidt Tina Nelsonina, Priit Pius Professor Fluxina, Tanel Saar Walter Nelson juuniorina, Ain Jurisson Krooni valvurina, jutustaja rollis on Tõnu Mikiver. Kasilased arenesid juba aegade alguses ainuraksetest kollastest organismidest ning nende eesmark on teisi teenida, ent nad on sattunud jarjest mitme edutu isanda teenistusse -turannosaurustest Napoleonini valja. Ilma isandata, keda teenida, langevad kasilased sugavasse masendusse. Ent uhel kasilasel, Kevinil, on plaan. Ta siirdub koos oma semude Stuarti ja Bobiga otsima uut kurja bossi, kellele ta siis koos kaaslastega alluda saaks. Otsingud viivad neid Scarlet Overkillini - maailma esimese naissoost supervargani.

programme.title: Lesed
programme.desc: "Lesed" on lugu neljast naisest, kel pole midagi uhist peale tohutu võlakoorma, mille on endast maha jatnud nende kurjategijatest abikaasad. Pinged jõuavad keemispunkti, kui Veronica (Viola Davis), Alice (Elizabeth Debicki), Linda (Michelle Rodriguez) ja Belle (Cynthia Erivo) otsustavad saatuse omaenda katesse haarata ning oma jõud uhendada. Tulemuseks on hulljulge plaan, mille eesmargiks on tagada endale elu, kus ei pea igal sammul surmahirmus ule õla vaatama...

programme.title: Teised
programme.desc: R: Alejandro Amenábar. O: Nicole Kidman, Fionnula Flanagan. Teisest maailmasõjast abikaasat koju ootav rangeid kasinusnõudeid hindav Grace elab koos oma poja ja tutrega viktoriaanlikus haarberis, kuhu laste uliharuldase haiguse tõttu ei tohi kunagi paikesevalgust paista. Hamar paik on lapsed pannud uskuma, et nende kodus elab veel keegi, keda palja silmaga ei nae, kuid ema peab jutte vaimudest valjamõeldiseks. Kui sõjast naasnud mees lahkub pere juurest pea sama markamatult, kui ta sinna saabus, mõistab Grace, et juttudel "teistest" võib olla tõepõhi all. Kaheksa Hispaania filmiauhinda Goya palvinud ja Veneetsia filmifestivalil esilinastunud mustilise thrilleri lavastaja on 2004. aastal Euroopa parimaks filmirežissooriks valitud Alejandro Amenábar ("Sisemeri"). Peaosas Oscari-võitja Nicole Kidman ("Moulin Rouge", "Tunnid").

programme.title: Kuninglik mang
programme.desc: Et gestaapo psuhholoogilisele piinamisele vastu seista, leiab natside poolt vangistatud advokaat varjupaiga malemaailmas.

programme.title: Valede linn
programme.desc: Russell Poole ja Jack Jackson uurivad rappar Notorious B.I.G. mõrva.

programme.title: Kiired ja vihased 7
programme.desc: USA | Hiina | Jaapan | Kanada | Araabia Ühendemiraadid 2015 marul Lavastaja:James Wan Osades:Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson Dominic (Vin Diesel) arvas koos oma tiimiga, et on kriminaalsest palgasõduri elust loobunud. Nad alistasid rahvusvahelise terroristi Owen Shaw ning laksid kõik oma teed. Ent nuud asub Shaw vend Deckard kattemaksuks ukshaaval tiimi liikmeid tapma. Lisaks uritavad Somaalia terrorist Jakarde ja uks rapane valitsusametnik uksteise võidu varastada arvutiprogrammi Jumala Silm, mis võib mistahes tehnoloogilise seadme relvaks muuta. Torretto peab oma kamba uuesti kokku ajama, et Shaw peatada ja Jumala Silm enda katte saada, olles samas kistud võimuvõitlusesse terroristi ja USA valitsuse vahel.

programme.title: Joomapidu
programme.desc: Tume komoodia maailmast, kus narkootikumid ja alkohol on illegaalsed, kuid uhel paeval aastas võivad kõik tagajargedele mõtlemata end vabaks lasta ja kõike tarvitada. Kolm kaheksateistkumneaastast on otsustanud just seda teha.

programme.title: Kummaline maagia
programme.desc: Muusikaline muinasjutt raagib varvikast seltskonnast, kuhu kuuluvad haldjad, kollid, paharetid ja igasugu teised maagilised tegelased, kes võitlevad uhe vaga võimsa võlujoogi nimel.

programme.title: Emma ja must jaaguar
programme.desc: Eesti keelde dubleeritud kogupereseiklus, milles filmi peategelase Emma lapsepõlv moodus Amazonase vihmametsas koos kodustatud vaikse musta jaaguari Lootusega. Olude sunnil pidi Emma aga New Yorki elama minema, kuid naaseb džunglisse suurde ohtu sattunud Lootust paastma.

programme.title: Imedepark
programme.desc: USA,Hispaania 2019 animakomoodia Lavastaja:David Feiss Osades (haaled):Kirke Selirand (June), Marko Matvere (Mõmmu), Janek Joost (Steve), Mart Avandi (Gus), Ott Sepp (Cooper), Raimo Pass (Pahkel), Marilyn Jurman (Greta). Kujutle ebatavalist lõbustusparki, kus gravitatsiooni trotsivad karussellid, ameerika raudteed ja vaaterattad vuhistavad kilkavaid kulastajaid tuhinal labi õhu, tanavad on tais varvikaid tegelasi ja imetabased atraktsioonid panevad lapsed vaimustusest õhku ahmima. Just sellise lõputut lusti ja ullatusi tais Imedepargi mõtles valja 8-aastane matemaatika- ja inseriteaduse fann June koos oma kalli emaga.

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: Kaks Kuldgloobust võitnud muusikaline draama legendaarsest ansamblist Queen, nende muusikast ja nende veelgi legendaarsemast juhtfiguurist Freddie Mercuryst, kes purustas igal sammul stereotuupe ning uldisi tavasid teel meie planeedi kõigi aegade uheks suurimaks meelelahutajaks. Band tõusis meteoriidina muusikamaailma tippu, põhjuseks nende ikoonilised laulud ja revolutsiooniline kõla. Selle kõik ahvardab havitada Mercury kontrollimatu elustiil, kuid pealtnaha uletamatud raskused suudetakse uletada ning tulemuseks on ansambli triumfaalne taasuhinemine maailma kõigi aegade suurimal heategevuskontserdil Live Aid, kus ravimatu haigusega silmitsi seisev Mercury veab bandi rokkmuusika ajaloo uhe legendaarseima etteasteni, tsementeerides selle kaigus ansambli parandi.

programme.title: Jerry ja Marge võtavad suurelt ette
programme.desc: Põhineb tõestisundinud lool pikalt abielus olnud Jerry ja Marge Selbeest, kes võidavad loteriiga suure summa ja kasutavad raha oma vaikelinna taaselustamiseks.

programme.title: Üksinda kodus
programme.desc: Üksinda kodus ("Home Alone") 98 min. komoodia USA 1990 Rezhissoor: Chris Columbus Osades: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci,Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine OHara Kultuskomoodia esimeses osas kehastab Macaulay Culkin 8-aastast Kevin McCallisteri, kelle perekond tormab kolm paeva enne jõule Pariisi ning unustab Kevini kogemata koju. Üksi kodus olles peab poiss kõikvõimalike vahendite abil eemale peletama kahte murdvarast, kes said teada, et poiss on ihuuksi suures majas. Samal ajal mõtleb ema lennukis sõites, et nii suures saginas unustas ta ilmtingimata midagi koju. Kui ta aga aru saab, et see "midagi"on tema noorim poeg, puuab ta meeleheitlikult koju tagasi sõita.

programme.title: Kattemaks
programme.desc: Matt Turner (Liam Neeson) on Berliinis elav edukas ameerika arimees, kes tegeleb uheaegselt nii õitseva finantskarjaari kui ka perekohustustega. Ühel hommikul lapsi kooli sõidutades saab ta telefonikõne salaparaselt haalelt: ta istme all on pomm, mis ei plahvata vaid juhul, kui ta taidab teatud ulesannetejada, ja teeb seda kiiresti. Matt, kihutades suurel kiirusel labi linna, peab jargima võõra uha ohtlikumaks muutuvaid juhendeid võidujooksus ajaga, et kaitsta oma peret ja lahendada musteerium, mis uhe paeva jooksul lahti rullub.

programme.title: Pesa
programme.desc: Ambitsioonikas ettevõtja ja endine borsimaakler Rory OHara võtab oma ameeriklannast abikaasa Allisoni ja lapsed kaasa ja kolib teisele poole ookeani, et alustada uut elu Inglismaal. Haistes edu, laheb Rory tagasi oma endisesse firmasse ning liisib sajanditevanuse haarberi, kus oleks ruumi nii Allisoni hobustele kui ka luksuslikele vastuvõttudele. Peatselt aga hakkab lubadus uuest tulusast algusest haabuma ning abikaasad seisavad silmitsi ebamugavate probleemidega, mis on seni pinna all peidus pusinud.

programme.title: Luud ja muu
programme.desc: Noor naine laheb 1000-miilisele seiklusele labi Ameerika, kus ta kohtub vagabundist noormehega. Kuid kõik viib lõpuks tagasi nende hirmuaratavasse minevikku ja peab selguma, kas nende armastus suudab ellu jaada.

programme.title: Liitlased
programme.desc: Suurbritannia / USA 2016 romantiline thriller Lavastaja: Robert Zemeckis Osades:Brad Pitt, Marion Cotillard, Jared Harris Lugu II maailmasõja paevilt on inspireeritud tõsielusundmustest ning jutustab kirgliku ja ohtudest pikitud loo Briti luureohvitser Max Vatanist (Brad Pitt) ja tema armastatust. 1942. aastal Põhja-Aafrikas uhel eluohtlikul missioonil viibides kohtab Max Prantsuse vastupanuliikumise võitlejat Marianne Beausejourd (Marion Cotillard) ning nende toiselt alanud tutvusest saab peagi kirg. Kui armastajad on paar aastat hiljem end Londonis sisse seadnud ja puuavad pereidulli nautida, teevad võimuesindajad Maxile teatavaks, et legendaarse Marianne minevik võib olla aarmiselt kurjakuulutav. Maxi sunnitakse surmaahvardusel oma naise tõelist olemus valja selgitama. Kui nii keerulisse olukorda on segatud sugavad tunded, ei ole kunagi tegemist mustvalgete valikutega.

programme.title: Kutt ja kaks kuningannat
programme.desc: USA 2016 seiklusmarul Lavastaja:Cedric Nicolas-Troyan Osades:Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Jessica Chastain, Emily Blunt, Nick Frost Kuri Ravenna (Charlize Theron) saab teada, et ta õde, kuninganna Freya (Emily Blunt), on rase ja armastab uht ulikut. Freya sunnitab vaikse tudruku, ent ta armuke tapab beebi. Freya raev vallandab jaised võluvõimed ning ta tapab mehe. Freya randab põhja, et ehitada loss ning panna kokku armee, mis rooviks lapsi ja kasvataks neist halastamatud sõdalased. Aastad mooduvad ja Eric (Chris Hemsworth) ning Sara (Jessica Chastain) on suureks kasvanud ning uksteisesse armunud. Nad plaanivad lossist põgeneda, ent Freya ehitab nende vahele jaast seina. Ühel paeval jaab Lumivalgeke haigeks ning ta abikaasa otsib Ericut, et oelda talle, et võlupeegel laks kaduma teel paika nimega Varjupaik. Eric liitub kahe harjapõlvlasega, et peegel ules otsida, ent nende missiooni saadavad ohud.

programme.title: Guinness Six Nations
programme.desc: The Six Nations Championship is an annual international mens rugby union competition between the rugby teams of England, France, Ireland, Italy, Scotland, and Wales. Its format is quite simple: each team plays every other team once making a total of 15 matches, with home ground advantage alternating from one year to the next. The current champions are England, who won the 2020 tournament.

programme.title: 1. Bundesliga
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: NBA korvpall
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

Ligue 1 McDonalds
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.sub-title: Jarrod and Alis Tiny Winery Homes
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Buying the Beach
programme.desc: Prospective home-buyers in the USA are shown exclusive properties nestled on the beachfront, giving them access to a personal oasis on their doorstep. The buyers are shown three dream properties before choosing their favourite. These spectacular properties are jaw-droppingly beautiful, providing families with the opportunity to open their doors and dip their toes in the sea. Paradise comes at a price though, and these exquisite homes do not come cheap. The show is part of the "Buying" franchise that also includes Buying Alaska, Buying the Bayou and Buying Hawaii.

programme.title: Desert Flippers
programme.desc: Reality series following experienced property renovators Eric and Lindsey Bennett. After leaving their Wisconsin home behind, Eric and Lindsey have their sights set firmly on transforming properties in Palm Springs, California. Palm Springs has seen a boom in the housing market with many people flocking to enjoy its beautiful warm climate. With the help of "Uncle Mike" Schneider, the pair transform some of the most neglected properties in the area, producing unrecognisable houses from the ones they took on. From venomous snakes to angry scorpions, unmovable squatters to crumbling structures, Eric and Lindsey soon learn that polishing these diamonds in the rough, as well as raising three children, is going to take all the energy they have.

programme.title: Selling The Hamptons
programme.desc: In the high-stakes world of Hamptons real estate, the art of buying, selling, hustling, and schmoozing is all part of the game. But this is the Hamptons like weve never seen before. As life is slowly getting back to normal for most people around the world, life in the Hamptons is the busiest its ever been! And the Nest Seekers Team is in overdrive trying to adapt to a market that hasnt seen this type of demand... ever! As the weather heats up, so does the competition for these young brokers who want to prove that they can find success in the most exclusive real estate market in the country.

In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Homeowners who still consider they house of 20 years to be their dream home ask Jenn to give its outdated spaces a major facelift.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: The Nate and Jeremiah Home Project
programme.sub-title: The Make Room To Grow Project
programme.desc: Nate and Jeremiah rework the layout in an old Victorian, so a young family has room to grow. They create a bedroom suite and kids spaces.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Divided By Design
programme.desc: Eilyn needs to maximise value in an iconic architects high-rise. And Eilyn and Ray team up to renovate the home of Eilyns father and stepmother.

programme.title: Breaking New Ground
programme.desc: The kitchen and the dining room renovations become one of Roberts biggest challenges, in both balancing the books and making important decisions.

programme.title: Building Outside the Lines
programme.desc: Cappie and Alex create the perfect oasis for a busy local family by turning a shipping container into a luxury swimming pool with underwater windows.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab
programme.desc: Windy City Rehab is a reality renovation show hosted by interior designer Alison Victoria. She and her expert team buy and restore old homes in her beloved Chicago historic neighborhoods. It is much more than a simple improvement of a house. Alison and her team are rescuing vintage houses and hold true to the original style and architecture as much as possible. They do their best to pay tribute to the historic roots, while integrating some modern makeovers.

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: An adventurous couple have fallen in love with the quaint town of Carolina Beach. They hope to find a move-in ready condo thats close to the beach.

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: A young couple swap Colorado Springs for Carolina Beach, so they can be near the water. They hope to find a home with enough space for the family.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Divided By Design
programme.desc: Eilyn needs to maximise value in an iconic architects high-rise. And Eilyn and Ray team up to renovate the home of Eilyns father and stepmother.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Juba sadu aastaid on liikunud legendid, et kõikjal Ameerika Ühendriikides on peidetud tohutuid aarded. Kuid kas need legendid kadunud aaretest on pelgalt jutud? Või on võimalik, et uskumatud aarded ootavad tõesti avastamist?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on inimkond puudnud luua kontakti maavaliste olenditega. Nuud, mil uued tehnoloogiad võimaldavad meil uurida miljardeid tahti ule kogu universumi, kas oleme jõudnud lahedale esimesele kontaktile?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Meeskond suunab oma tahelepanu tagasi maele ja saab peaaegu kohe rohkem tõendeid millegi kohta, mis on sugavale mae sisse maetud. Ja Brandon naaseb koos Utah peaprokuroriga, kes tahab teada saada, kes jalgib rantšot.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Egiptuse liiva all asub 24 tohutut sarkofaagi, mis kõik on tuhjad. Mis eesmarki võisid need hiiglaslikud hauakambrid taita? Ja kas on võimalik, et need taiuslikult nikerdatud kastid ei ole mitte inimeste, vaid maavaliste kulaliste poolt kujundatud?

programme.title: Peale Skinwalkeri rantšo
programme.desc: Andy ja Paul sõidavad Fayettevillei Põhja-Carolinas, et uurida meest, kellel on videotõendid vaidetavatest korduvatest kohtumistest UAP-dega, ja testida tema võimalikke "kvantpõimumise" võimeid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui Ton ja Allen avastavad end oksjonil uksteise vastu pakkumisi tegemas, võitlevad endised partnerid vagevas vastasseisus, mis jatab pandimaja saatuse ja nende sõpruse kusimargi alla.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Parast purustavat luuasaamist lahkuvad poisid oksjonilt tuhjade katega ja otsivad õuemuugilt uut kaupa. Kuid kahtlased antiiksed tennisereketid ja iidne eriefektide kast ei pruugi neile sentigi teenida.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kas me saame midagi teha, et ennustada tulevikku ja kaitsta end apokalupsise eest? Kas meie tsivilisatsioon lõpeb - või leiame võimaluse areneda ja pusima jaada?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Optimism on suur, kui vennaskond naaseb Smiths Covei ja leiab tõendeid toode kohta, mis võivad lõpuks paljastada legendaarsed uleujutustunnelid ja viia nad otse Money Piti juurde.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Corey ja Chumlee rokivad isiklike suveniiridega legendaarselt AC/DC ninamehelt Angus Youngilt. Siis jõuab poodi Hollywoodi massaja James Deani nimeline kaevõru. Seejarel sõidab Rick itta haruldase teise maailmasõja aegse esemega head kaupa tegema.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui klient tuleb poodi haruldase HG Wellsi raamatuga - ja astronoomilise hinnaga - kas Corey lendab siis tahtede poole? Seejarel aga ei ole lollitamist, kui pandimajja saabub turkiisist tehtud kuju. Kas see palvib Ricki heakskiidu või hukkamõistu?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen saavad jagu oma kõige agedamast vastasest CJ-st, kuid saatuse keerdkaik hoiab poisid mangus. Nad avastavad Geigeri loenduri ja NASCARi lookmutrivõtmed, aga nende raamatupidaja toob neile šokeerivaid uudiseid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Olulise otsuse aarel seisavad Ton ja Allen silmitsi Carolyniga Covina oksjonil. Nad võidavad "eriefektide boksi", mis sisaldab suuri masinaid hullumeelsete trikkide tegemiseks. Mehed otsustavad poe saatuse ule.

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Selles erisaates laheme Combat Ready Arti sepikotta Kalamazoos Michigani osariigis, kus kolm tippseppa pannakse erakordsele proovile. Parast kahte karmi katsumust paaseb vaid uks neist edasi, et esindada Combat Ready Arti lõpliku peaauhinna nimel.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui halastamatu poeomanik tahab takistada Toni ja Allenit uute esemete hankimisel Santa Barbaras, ajavad nad sõrad vastu. Mehed avastavad haruldase antiikse õhupussi ja vanaaegse puust paadi, mis on ehitatud kihutamiseks, kui see vaid ujub.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Kui nende veoauto katki laheb, panevad Ton ja Allen kõik mangu, et koguda raha selle parandamiseks. Nad saavad lauajalgpalli, Tommy Guni trummid ja Toni rõõmuks terve laari Twinkiesi koogikesi, kuid kas sellest piisab?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Mehed võitlevad oma ageda endise tootajaga, samal ajal, kui hinnakergitaja ahvardab paeva ara rikkuda. Kui kõik lootus naib olevat kadunud, on monsterauto rehvide komplekt ja salaparane kast nende viimaseks võimaluseks võitjaks saada.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Uurime 75 miljoni aasta jagu kõige usutavamaid tõendeid tulnukatest siin Maal, alates dinosauruste ajastust kuni Vana-Egiptuseni ja tanapaeva USA laaneosa kõrbetaevani.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad lahevad Hollywoodi, kus Darrell Sheets avastab uue mooduse kasumi arvestamiseks. Nabila Hannis astub labi ning Jarrod ja Brandi teevad šokeeriva avastuse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barry avastab vanaaegse GPS-susteemi ning Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad ainulaadse ulikonna. Dave Hester satub aga keerulisse olukorda.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrell Sheets satub selle sarja suurima leiu otsa. Jarrod ja Brandi uritavad olukorda parandada parast seda, kui on kaotanud natuke raha ja uhe tootaja.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kas me saame midagi teha, et ennustada tulevikku ja kaitsta end apokalupsise eest? Kas meie tsivilisatsioon lõpeb - või leiame võimaluse areneda ja pusima jaada?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Aeg tiksub, kui muuja toob pandimajja Mr. T seinakella. Kas Rick ja Corey naevad kulda või haletsevad nad lolli? Chum ja Rick lahevad Texases fossiile otsima. Kuid kas nad suudavad tehingu valja kaevata või mattuvad tolmu alla?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskond naaseb sohu ja avastab kohe rohkem tõendeid uppunud laeva kohta. Ja Money Pitis võib kokkuvarisenud ehitise avastamine tahendada, et nad on lõpuks ometi avastanud eraldatud kambri.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Maailma kumme parimat puramiidide asukohta, alates Peruu orust, kus on ule 250 peidetud puramiidi, kuni vana Kreeka linna salaparaste 4800 aasta vanuste varemeteni ja Egiptuse kuulsa Giza platoonini.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Meid on paelunud meie lahim naaberplaneet Veenus. See on umbes sama suur kui meie maailm, kaetud tohutute vulkaanide ja murgiste happevihmapilvedega. Kas Veenus on meie kuri kaksik või hoiatus selle kohta, milliseks Maa tulevikus muutub?

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Sajandeid on see Atlandi ookeani piirkond olnud kõige kurikuulsam ookeanilõik Maal. Laevad, lennukid ja pahaaimamatud reisijad on siin jaljetult kadunud. Mis võib põhjustada nii palju salaparaseid kadumisi Bermuda kolmnurgas?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen seisavad silmitsi oma seni kõige raskema valjakutsega, kui kaks vana rivaali jõud uhendavad. Mehed kaevavad valja krossimootorratta ja paar võrgupussi, samal ajal kui tootajad põrkuvad Haff Ton Pawnis salaparaste ostjatega.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Allen laheb koos Elleiga oksjonile, samal ajal kui Ton ja Big Sis uuendavad poodi, et aidata rohkem kliente tuua. Allen avastab Ouija laua ja retrokorvpallide komplekti ning laheb kuulsa NBA-staariga võistlema.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen suunduvad Nashvillei, kus nad muristavad koos karmi tsiklijõuguga, kes pakuvad kõrget hinda. Paev elavneb, kui poisid avastavad 37 mm tankitõrjekahuri ja kauboi rodeosadula.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Milline on tõde vulkaanide laheduses korduvalt taheldatud UFO-de taga? Kes või mis valmistas Costa Rica kummalised kivikerad? Ja mis on uksinda džunglis elava tundmatu mehe saladus?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Chumlee suunduvad Los Angelesi, et omastada mitu kuulsat eset filmist filmist "Terminaator". Seejarel laheb Corey poordesse Alice in Chains suveniiride peale. Lisaks panevad Rick ja Chumlee proovile mõned terasest trukiplaadid.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskonna suured lootused muinasjutuline aare leida suurenevad veelgi, kui nad leiavad midagi, mis võib olla mõistatuse viimane tukk.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Juba sadu aastaid on liikunud legendid, et kõikjal Ameerika Ühendriikides on peidetud tohutuid aarded. Kuid kas need legendid kadunud aaretest on pelgalt jutud? Või on võimalik, et uskumatud aarded ootavad tõesti avastamist?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tanapaeva maailmas usume, et tehnoloogia kaitseb meid katastroofide eest. Kuid kas me oleme tõesti kaitstud? Või oleme tanapaeval sama haavatavad, kui olid meie esivanemad tulekahjude, maavarinate ja orkaanide suhtes?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad suunduvad Comptonisse, kus Jarrod saab endale uue huudnime ja leiab midagi, mida ta kunagi kogus. Mike ostab lao, mida Herb ei taha ja Barry uhineb oma vana sõbra Kennyga.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barry Weiss toob kohale ulemteenri. Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad vanaaegse lambi. Darrel Sheets maksab uhe lao eest kõige suurema summa, mida ta selles sarjas teinud on, aga kas see on seda vaart?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Asjad muutuvad hirmutavaks, kui muuja saabub koos Stephen Kingi kirjaga. Kas palju tood ja vahe mangu teeb Coreyst igava poisi? Corey kiidab Harrisonide peretraditsioonile takka, kui saabub James Bondi plakat. Kas ta luurab tehingut?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud Giorgio Tsoukalos, William Henry ja Jason Martell paljastavad kõige veenvamad tõendid iidsete lennumasinate kohta ja uurivad võimalust, et need maavalised kohtumised on aset leidnud labi aegade.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Pandipoe ajalooga Ton ja Allen alustavad oma karjaari jargmist peatukki suure pauguga. Nad avastavad teise maailmasõja aegse tulirelva ja vene kosmonautide skafandri, mis võib olla nende seni suurim leid... kui see on tõeline.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen lahevad vastamisi oma endise assistendi Carolyniga, samal ajal kui Ton võitleb seljavaluga. Mehed avastavad automaat-õhupussi ja kui labiraakimised trikirambi muumiseks lahevad halvasti, seisab Allen raske otsuse ees.

programme.desc: Ton ja Allen suunduvad Nashvillei, kus nad muristavad koos karmi tsiklijõuguga, kes pakuvad kõrget hinda. Paev elavneb, kui poisid avastavad 37 mm tankitõrjekahuri ja kauboi rodeosadula.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tanapaeva maailmas usume, et tehnoloogia kaitseb meid katastroofide eest. Kuid kas me oleme tõesti kaitstud? Või oleme tanapaeval sama haavatavad, kui olid meie esivanemad tulekahjude, maavarinate ja orkaanide suhtes?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrell Sheets paistab taas silma, kui teeb sarja kõige suurema tehingu. Mark Balelo ilmub valja koos kasitoona valminud meeste kotiga, mis on raha tais. Barry saab oma mootori kaima.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barry toob kohale kitšikuninga Charles Phoenixi, et saada oksjonist paremat pilti. Darrell ei usu, et on olemas koduvaljaku eelis.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Endine vabamaadleja Ivy Calvin laheb tagasi ringi ning satub peagi silm-silma vastu Darrelliga. Jarrod ja Brandi teevad ostu ning kohtuvad uhe nohikuga.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kas oleks võimalik surma petta ja elada igavesti? Mis siis, kui iidseid õpetusi uuesti labi vaadates ja kaasaegset tehnoloogiat kasutades saaksime lõpuks surematuks?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Asjad muutuvad hirmutavaks, kui muuja saabub koos Stephen Kingi kirjaga. Kas palju tood ja vahe mangu teeb Coreyst igava poisi? Corey kiidab Harrisonide peretraditsioonile takka, kui saabub James Bondi plakat. Kas ta luurab tehingut?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskonna suured lootused muinasjutuline aare leida suurenevad veelgi, kui nad leiavad midagi, mis võib olla mõistatuse viimane tukk.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kumme olulisemat tulnukate sõidukit, alates V-kujulistest objektidest kuni valguskerade ja lendavate taldrikuteni. Kas nende sage markamine võib olla tõendiks maavaliste olendite kulaskaigu kohta?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud Giorgio Tsoukalos, William Henry ja Jason Martell paljastavad kõige veenvamad tõendid iidsete lennumasinate kohta ja uurivad võimalust, et need maavalised kohtumised on aset leidnud labi aegade.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Big Sis edastab halbu uudiseid, kui poisid põrkuvad Carolyniga Long Beachi oksjonil karnevaliuksuse parast. Ton ja Allen avastavad indiaanlaste tomahoogi, laadatunni ja haruldase relva, mis suudab teha kolm lasku korraga.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen saavad jagu oma kõige agedamast vastasest CJ-st, kuid saatuse keerdkaik hoiab poisid mangus. Nad avastavad Geigeri loenduri ja NASCARi lookmutrivõtmed, aga nende raamatupidaja toob neile šokeerivaid uudiseid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Olulise otsuse aarel seisavad Ton ja Allen silmitsi Carolyniga Covina oksjonil. Nad võidavad "eriefektide boksi", mis sisaldab suuri masinaid hullumeelsete trikkide tegemiseks. Mehed otsustavad poe saatuse ule.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.sub-title: UFO-kontakt labi lennukiakna ja kadunud veealune linn
programme.desc: Šokeeriv UFO nagemine reisilennuki aknaaluselt istmelt. Veider veealune leid on vaidetavalt kadunud Jaapani linn. Ja kas hiiglaslikud laiskloomad vastutavad Brasiilias asuvate tunnelite eest?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Corey seab sihiku 19. sajandi algusest parit vintpussi prototuubile, mille on valmistanud mees, kes leiutas Bakeri vintpussi. Seejarel taiendab poodi originaalteos Pablo Picassolt endalt. Kas see tehing on ulim kunstiteos?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Meeskond on jahmunud, kui tõendid viitavad sellele, et soo servas on maetud tamm, mis kinnitab nii Fred Nolani teooriat kui ka Zena Halperni templiruutlite kaarti.

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Sajandeid on see Atlandi ookeani piirkond olnud kõige kurikuulsam ookeanilõik Maal. Laevad, lennukid ja pahaaimamatud reisijad on siin jaljetult kadunud. Mis võib põhjustada nii palju salaparaseid kadumisi Bermuda kolmnurgas?

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Võistlus võtab kiirema kaigu, kui sepad saavad ulesandeks teha 1971. aasta Mercury Cougari roostes terasest elitaarse sõjavaerelva, mida tuntakse jatagani nime all.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad suunduvad Homelandi, aga Harrise vennad oleksid pidanud koju jaama. Jarrod ja Brandi tegelevad ostmisega, pinged samas kasvavad. Rene ja Casey ostavad lao, aga saavad peagi aru, et on teinud vea.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad ebatavalise kunstiteose, Rene ja Casey naudivad veini ning Barry raamatupidaja uritab teda tagasi hoida.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: "Iidsed tulnukad" loeb ules kumme tõenaolisemat kohta ule maailma, mis võivad varjata tulnukate baase, sealhulgas Antarktika jaa all asuv koobas, Hiinas asuv jarv, mis on UFOde lemmikpaigaks, ja puramiid Denali mae nõlvade all.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kuni meeskond leiab jatkuvalt tõendeid, et nad võivad olla uleujutustunnelite lahedal, avastab tipptasemel maapinda labiv radar Money Pitis midagi, mis võiks olla raskesti ligipaasetav kõrvalkamber.

programme.title: Muistsete tulnukate eriesitlus
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud on juba ammu vaitnud, et Maa on maavaline laboratoorium. Kas see hõlmab sel juhul lisaks inimestele ka loomi? Üle maailma võib leida teateid loom-jumalate kohta, mis kummalisel moel peegeldavad kohtumisi tulnukatega.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kas oleks võimalik surma petta ja elada igavesti? Mis siis, kui iidseid õpetusi uuesti labi vaadates ja kaasaegset tehnoloogiat kasutades saaksime lõpuks surematuks?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Endine vabamaadleja Ivy Calvin laheb tagasi ringi ning satub peagi silm-silma vastu Darrelliga. Jarrod ja Brandi teevad ostu ning kohtuvad uhe nohikuga.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Pandipoe ajalooga Ton ja Allen alustavad oma karjaari jargmist peatukki suure pauguga. Nad avastavad teise maailmasõja aegse tulirelva ja vene kosmonautide skafandri, mis võib olla nende seni suurim leid... kui see on tõeline.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen lahevad vastamisi oma endise assistendi Carolyniga, samal ajal kui Ton võitleb seljavaluga. Mehed avastavad automaat-õhupussi ja kui labiraakimised trikirambi muumiseks lahevad halvasti, seisab Allen raske otsuse ees.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.sub-title: UFO-kontakt labi lennukiakna ja kadunud veealune linn
programme.desc: Šokeeriv UFO nagemine reisilennuki aknaaluselt istmelt. Veider veealune leid on vaidetavalt kadunud Jaapani linn. Ja kas hiiglaslikud laiskloomad vastutavad Brasiilias asuvate tunnelite eest?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Viimase hetke oksjon Norwalkis osutub keeruliseks, kui Ton ja Allen lahevad vastamisi tõelise kauboipaariga. Kui tolm settib, avastavad poisid 3D-printeri ja haardekonksuga relva, millest tulistamist ei jõua nad ara oodata.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: If you have ever wondered how egg rolls are mass produced or what is inside a hamburger, have a look at the Food Tech hosted by Bobby Bognar. Bobby have worked in the food industry and restaurants most of his life, and is in love with food. In every episode he makes a preparation of a well-known American meal and tracks the ingredients from the field or factory to your plate, presenting fantastic stories hiding behind your favourite food.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: Viikingite maailma kuulsaimast sõdalasest pajatav Beowulfi legend on ulim lugu vaprusest.

programme.title: Monsterquest
programme.desc: Ancient petroglyphs in the Sierra Nevada mountains depict footprints left by frightening packs of hairy man-like beasts. Now, MonsterQuest heads to the heart of California where witnesses are encountering aggressively territorial packs of Sasquatch.

programme.title: Iidne võimatu
programme.desc: Me uurime iidseid tekste, et paljastada hammastavaid Vana-Rooma tehnoloogiaid, mille hulgas olid naiteks hobuse poolt veetav nooli tulistav masin - ehk oli see maailma esimene tank?

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: If you have ever wondered how egg rolls are mass produced or what is inside a hamburger, have a look at the Food Tech hosted by Bobby Bognar. In every episode he makes a preparation of a well-known American meal and tracks the ingredients from the field or factory to your plate, presenting fantastic stories hiding behind your favourite food.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Even the most common, ordinary objects in the modern world and history may contain secret messages, steeped in codes and symbols. These mysterious ideas and theories come directly from the mind of best-selling author Brad Meltzer, who uncovered them during his research for his fictional thrillers. In each episode, Brad poses these questions to a group of elite researchers, who will travel far and wide to examine the clues and decode the hidden meaning behind these seemingly innocuous origins. They will canvas the darkest reaches of the world to connect dots toward revealing a deeper truth.

programme.title: Greatest discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. The veteran investigates what made these legendary fighters great, but also what were their weaknesses. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Former Green Berry Terry Schappert explores the stories of some of the most iconic warrior groups in history, including their weaponry, training, fighting tactics and more. The veteran investigates what made these legendary fighters great, but also what were their weaknesses. Join him as he looks into the battling masteries of the Vikings, the Samurai, the Spartans and more.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Even the most common, ordinary objects in the modern world and history may contain secret messages, steeped in codes and symbols. These mysterious ideas and theories come directly from the mind of best-selling author Brad Meltzer, who uncovered them during his research for his fictional thrillers. In each episode, Brad poses these questions to a group of elite researchers, who will travel far and wide to examine the clues and decode the hidden meaning behind these seemingly innocuous origins. They will canvas the darkest reaches of the world to connect dots toward revealing a deeper truth.

programme.title: Greatest discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: Vaike papuurusetukk, mis on vaart rohkem kui oma kaal kullas, on Oxfordi superstaarist õppejõu Dirk Obbinki jaoks lõpu algus. See on viimane peatukk Vana-Egiptuse ruustamisest kui eluviisist.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Jaht "Laanemere kullale"
programme.desc: Amber has been coveted in Poland since the 15th century, when handmade jewellery incorporating this semi-precious stone (even though it is not a stone) was sought after by members of the Royal, Imperial, Papal and Ottoman Courts. With 70% of the worlds amber being produced in Poland, the industry is still thriving, especially in the coastal areas around the port city of Gdansk. The viewer will learn about the journey of amber, from its origins as fossilized tree resin to its extraction from the ground and its transfromation into creative and beautiful decorations. The show also tells the story of the people who work in the industry and the difficulties they face in harvesting the amber, getting it to market and selling it.

programme.title: Motorhead - Rock Im Park
programme.desc: Rock im Park is a music festival that takes place in Nuremberg, Germany, lasting three days. Featuring : Motorhead

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe met in a record store in West London. Although they came from different backgrounds they bonded over a love of electronic music. "Hague" their debut album "Please" was released in 1986, it entered the top 10 around the world. In 2013 the band released "Electric", which after the mellow Elysium saw them return to their dance roots, 30 years into their career the Pet Shop Boys remain top of the charts. Featuring archive material, music videos "Vocal", "Love etc".and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard)

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: Iggy Pop - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Blondie - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Blondie performs her hits including Heart of Glass", "Euphoria", Mile High" and many more…

programme.title: George Thorogood and the Destroyers - Live at Montreux 2013
programme.desc: George Thorogood is an American icon. In a career that stretches back to the mid-seventies, he and his band The Destroyers have released 16 studio albums with worldwide sales in excess of 15 million. 2013 saw George and The Destroyers make their long overdue debut at the legendary Montreux Jazz Festival. Performing at an event that had previously played host to many of their musical heroes inspired the band to produce one of their finest performances on a set list that stretched back to their eponymous debut album from 1977 and right up to their most recent releases. This is goodtime rocking blues and nobody does it better than George Thorogood and The Destroyers.

programme.title: Shakira - Oral Fixation Tour
programme.desc: Oral Fixation Tour was the fourth concert tour by Colombian singer and songwriter, Shakira. It was launched in support of her sixth and seventh studio albums Fijacion Oral, Vol. 1 (2005). and Oral Fixation, Vol. 2 (2005).

programme.title: AC/DC - Circus Krone
programme.desc: Filmed at the world famous Circus Krone in Munich, this AC/DC concert from June 17, 2003 features standout performances of "Rock N Roll Damnation" and "Whats Next To The Moon" and more.

programme.title: Enrique Iglesias _ Live from Odyssey Arena
programme.desc: Filmed at Odyssey Arena, Belfast, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Enrique Iglesias featuring unforgettable version of his hits: ""Bailamos"", ""Hero"", ""Be With You"" and many more….

programme.title: Ozzy Osbourne _ God Bless Ozzy Osbourne
programme.desc: Ozzy Osbourne is one of the most iconic figures in rock and one of the founding fathers of heavy metal. ""God Bless Ozzy Osbourne"" tells for the first time the story of his career from the founding of Black Sabbath through to solo stardom and his wider fame beyond. These were the wild days of his prodigious drug and alcohol intake, of biting the head from a dove at a record company meeting and biting into a bat on stage but also of the tragic death of Randy Rhoads and the reality TV show The Osbournes. The film follows Ozzys torturous and emotionally fraught journey from excess to sobriety, which Ozzy regards as his greatest accomplishment. Featuring never before seen footage, new interviews with Ozzy himself, his family, his bandmates, and those who both inspired him and were inspired by him, this is the first film to take viewers inside the mind and psyche of this legendary figure.

programme.title: Lana Del Rey _ Live in London
programme.desc: Born to Die is the second album by singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey, and the first to be officially released on January 27, 2012 and that would lead to global success; In countries such as the United Kingdom the album was the best selling of that year, that recognition made her a guest of honor in one of the most popular London festivals iTunes Festival, where she would open the awe of all attendees on the night of September 25 2012 at the Roundhouse in the city of London.

programme.title: Foals - A Session With Foals
programme.desc: Being from the rain-ridden lands of England, Foals are used to a different kind of festival environment: generally speaking, frontman Yannis Philippakis described them as "mud and wellies" ordeals. So were sure they were quite pleased to travel halfway around the world to the California desert to perform for Coachellas music-hungry crowds. Prior to taking to the stage in Indio, however, Foals made a pit stop at our little poolside bungalow to perform a Festival Fever Session featuring songs off their highly-acclaimed, recent full-length Holy Fire. While you might have already seen the bands in-the-flesh transformation of "My Number" into a slow-burning beaut, weve expanded the session to include the subtle closer "Moon".

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Blondie - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Blondie performs her hits including Heart of Glass", "Euphoria", Mile High" and many more…

programme.title: George Michael Londonis
programme.desc: Need olid George Michaeli kaks viimast kontserti Londoni Ears Courti laval, 24. ja 25. augustil 2008, osana tema tuurist 25 Live. Laule jatkus tema pika karjaari igalt etapilt.

programme.title: Electric Light Orchestra - Live at Wembley
programme.desc: Captured live at Londons Wembley Arena and directed by Mike Mansfield this space-age show will live forever in rock history as, quite literally, out of this world featuring a pioneering laser display, the first of its kind that set a precedent for subsequent rock shows. Standing in the Rain, Night in The Rain, Turn to Stone, Tight Rope, Telephone Line, Rock Aria, Wild West Hero, Show Down, Sweet Talking Woman, Roll Over Beethoven.

programme.title: John Mellencamp - Plain Spoken
programme.sub-title: John Mellencamp - Plain Spoken: Live in Chicago
programme.desc: John Mellencamps career in music, spanning more than 42 years, has seen him transition from pop star to one of the most highly regarded songwriters of a generation. Filmed at the landmark Chicago Theatre, just 250 miles away from his upbringing in Indiana, this cinematic concert documentary film captures John Mellencamp reflecting on his career accompanied by self-narration from his highly personal audio diary on his Midwestern upbringing, career and outlook on life as a whole. Meant to be more than just your run of the mill concert film, this intimate performance with full band will fully envelop the viewer into the Mellencamp mindset. "My vision was true, and my heart was too. And there was no end to what I could dream. Life is short, even in its longest days."

programme.title: The Cure - Eurockeennes 2012
programme.desc: The legendary rock band The Cure hits the stage at Eurockeennes in Belfort, in 2012.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Janis Joplin was one of the most successful and widely-known female rock stars of her era. After releasing three albums, she died of a heroin overdose at the age of 27. Her fourth album, Pearl, was released in January 1971, just over three months after her death. It reached number one on the Billboard charts. Her Legacy. The big-voiced, bluesy singer dominated the stage, forged her own path and paved the way for the female singers who followed.

programme.title: Snow Patrol - Live At Somerset House
programme.desc: With their third album, Final Straw, selling a cool 1.5 million in the UK in its year of release, Snow Patrols reputation as a remarkable band remains intact. "Live At Somerset House" reveals why the band is praised for delivering fantastic live performances. It also places them at one of Londons most gorgeous settings which complements the bands distinctive and provocative sound perfectly. Performing live for the first time with a string section, this amazing Snow Patrol concert, features all the key hits including Run, Spitting Games, "Chocolate" and a blistering version of Tiny Little Fractures.

programme.title: Florence And the Machine - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: David Guetta - iTunes Festival
programme.sub-title: David Guetta - iTunes Festival: Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic David Guetta featuring unforgettable version of his hits: "Without You", "Titanium", "One Love" and many more…

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Rush - The Rise Of Kings
programme.desc: Through a stunning combination of rare footage and insider insight this film traces the complete history of Rush.

programme.title: Celine Dion - Thats Just the Woman In Me
programme.desc: Thats Just the Woman in Me is an American television special by Canadian singer Celine Dion which was aired on CBS on February 15, 2008 and was recorded at the Wiltern Theater in Los Angeles, California

programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.
